title: Luxury Nob Hill 4 Bedroom/2 Bathroom flat Golden Gate Bridge Views
posting_body: ['1310 Leavenworth St -Luxury Rental Available', 'Rates for 1310 Leavenworth St', '$10,500 a month including cable TV and the internet.', 'Description:  Incredible 4 bedroom 2 bathroom full floor flat on the top of Nob Hill on Leavenworth St at Jones with some access to a large roof garden with views out over the Golden Gate Bridge and the SF Bay.', 'THE BEDROOMS have: 1 King -2 Queens-1 full.', 'THE KITCHEN is very contemporary in style with a stainless Fisher Paykel, 2 drawer dishwasher (high upper drawer)-a large stainless Subzero refrigerator and freezer, a stainless DSC gas range.', 'The DINING ROOM has an elegant long white wood table and seating for 10 persons.', 'GREAT FOR ENTERTAINING.', 'The living room is elegantly furnished with white, light green and black with black and white artwork (drawings) and a quadfafoil by well known new York artist Max Gimblett.', 'All the bedrooms are beautifully furnished -the bed linen is all 800 count pure cotton-and the duvets and pillows are all down.', 'The bathrooms are contemporary in style and one of the bathrooms has a roman bath tub.', 'There is a roomy separate laundry room in the apartment with a full sized washer and dryer.', 'Cable TV and wireless internet.', ' Parking is available.', 'The property is available from  September 9th 2022 when it is rented again until the end of August.', 'You can contact Patricia the owner on', 'show contact info', 'and she will gladly answer and questions for you.', 'You will not be disappointed as this is an elegant beautifully furnished large property.', 'There is a minimum 30 night stay required under SF law.']
